summary: Seasoned digital leader with 20+ years experience building and scaling businesses across North America and APAC. Co-Founder/Director at Ringkas building AI fintech infrastructure. Former Head of Digital Natives at AWS and senior leadership at Google. Expertise in AI/ML, cloud computing, digital strategy, and building high-performing teams. Raised $11.5M USD in funding and achieved $3M ARR with mortgage origination of $700M USD annualized.
